name: Pineapple-Chile Paletas
description: There's no sign at the popsicle haven Las Paletas in Nashville, Tennessee, which makes finding it tricky, but it's worth the sugary reward. The popsicles here are known for their powerful burst of unusual flavors like eggnog and hibiscus but what captured my heart was the sweet and spicy ice pops like pineapple-chile and cucumber-chile. It's cooling refreshment meeting the sizzle of chiles.

recipeInstructions.text: Combine pineapple, sugar, water, jalapenos, and lime juice in bowl of food processor. Pulse until mixture is pureed, about 15 one-second pulses. Adjust flavor with additional lime juice or sugar as desired. Add mixture to popsicle mold according to manufacturer's directions and freeze at least overnight. Run popsices under warm water to remove. Serve immediately.
